description.en: Once upon a midnight dreary, while I pondered, weak and weary. Over many a quaint and curious volume of forgotten lore.
description.ar: Once upon a midnight dreary, while I pondered, weak and weary. Over many a quaint and curious volume of forgotten lore.
description.br:
Em certo dia, à hora, à hora
Da meia-noite que apavora,
Eu caindo de sono e exausto de fadiga,
Ao pé de muita lauda antiga,
De uma velha doutrina, agora morta.
description.cns: 曾几何时，午夜沉闷，当我沉思在那么多古朴奇特的被遗忘的传说中时，我感到虚弱而疲倦。
description.fi: Once upon a midnight dreary, while I pondered, weak and weary. Over many a quaint and curious volume of forgotten lore.
description.fil: Once upon a midnight dreary, while I pondered, weak and weary. Over many a quaint and curious volume of forgotten lore.
description.id: Disaat aku merasa lelah dan lemah pada suatu malam, aku termenung dan menyadari akan banyaknya kisah yang terlupakan
description.it: Once upon a midnight dreary, while I pondered, weak and weary. Over many a quaint and curious volume of forgotten lore.
description.jp: ある時、真夜中の悲惨なことに、私が熟考している間、弱くて疲れていました。多くの古風で奇妙な忘れられた伝承。
description.kr: 한때 한밤중에 음울했고, 나는 생각하면서 약하고 지쳤다. 많은 기이하고 호기심 많은 잊혀진 이야기.
description.nl: Once upon a midnight dreary, while I pondered, weak and weary. Over many a quaint and curious volume of forgotten lore.
description.pl: Once upon a midnight dreary, while I pondered, weak and weary. Over many a quaint and curious volume of forgotten lore.
description.ru: Once upon a midnight dreary, while I pondered, weak and weary. Over many a quaint and curious volume of forgotten lore.
description.sp: Érase una vez una noche lúgubre, mientras meditaba, débil y cansado. Sobre muchos volúmenes extraños y curiosos de tradiciones olvidadas.
description.sw: Once upon a midnight dreary, while I pondered, weak and weary. Over many a quaint and curious volume of forgotten lore.
description.th: กาลครั้งหนึ่งยามเที่ยงคืนที่เศร้าหมอง ขณะที่ฉันครุ่นคิด อ่อนแอและเหน็ดเหนื่อย เหนือตำนานที่ถูกลืมไปหลายเล่มที่แปลกตาและน่าสงสัย
description.tw: 曾幾何時，午夜沉悶，當我沉思時，虛弱而疲倦，在許多古樸而好奇的被遺忘在傳說中。
description.vi: Ngày xửa ngày xưa, lúc nửa đêm buồn bã, trong khi tôi suy tư, yếu đuối và mệt mỏi. Qua nhiều tập truyện truyền thuyết bị lãng quên kỳ lạ và gây tò mò.
